StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertPreCommissionData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @AccessionDate date.me, @Ac.veDutyFY int, @CommissionDate date.me, @ContractID int, @FlightHours int, @HasFlightIndoctrina.on char(1), @HasPrivatePilotLicense char(1), @IsCrossCountryCer..ed char(1), @NwaID int, @ProjectedLawGradDate date.me, @RequestForAppointmentDate date.me, @TBSClass int, @TBSFY int, @LastEditBy varchar(15) ) AS BEGIN IF (@NwaID > 0) BEGIN DECLARE @TBS_ID int SET @TBS_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 TBS_ID FROM TBS WHERE CLASS = @TBSClass AND FY = @TBSFY)
INSERT INTO [mcriss].[dbo].[PRECOMMISSION_DATA] ([NWA_ID] ,[CONTRACT_ID] ,[TBS_ID] ,[FY_ACTIVE_DUTY_ASSIGNMENT] ,[PROJ_LAW_GRAD_DATE] ,[FLIGHT_INDOCTRINATION] ,[PRIVATE_PILOT] ,[FLIGHT_HOURS] ,[CERTIFIED_CROSS_COUNTRY] ,[REQUEST_FOR_APPOINTMENT_DATE] ,[USER_LOGIN] ,[UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@NwaID ,@ContractID ,@TBS_ID ,@Ac.veDutyFY ,@ProjectedLawGradDate ,@HasFlightIndoctrina.on ,@HasPrivatePilotLicense ,@FlightHours ,@IsCrossCountryCer..ed ,@RequestForAppointmentDate ,@LastEditBy ,GetDate() )
IF ((@NwaID IS NOT NULL) AND (@AccessionDate IS NOT NULL) AND (@LastEditBy IS NOT NULL)) BEGIN INSERT INTO [mcriss].[dbo].[OFFICER_ACCESSION] (NWA_ID ,ACCESSION_DATE ,USER_LOGIN ,UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES (@NwaID ,@AccessionDate ,@LastEditBy ,GetDate() ) END
-- If the OCS ID can be found, make sure that there is a Commissionee table entry for this NWA... DECLARE @intOCSID INT
SELECT @intOCSID = Max(OCS_ID) FROM OCS WHERE NWA_ID = @NwaID
IF (@intOCSID > 0) BEGIN -- Do we INSERT or do we UPDATE DECLARE @intCount int SELECT @intCount = Count(*) FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[COMMISSIONEE] WHERE CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID IF (@intCount = 0) BEGIN -- INSERT NEW ROW INSERT INTO [mcriss].[dbo].[COMMISSIONEE] (OCS_ID ,CONTRACT_ID ,COMMISSION_DATE ,USER_LOGIN ,UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES (@intOCSID ,@ContractID ,@CommissionDate ,@LastEditBy ,GetDate() ) END ELSE BEGIN -- UPDATE THE EXISTING ROW UPDATE [mcriss].[dbo].[COMMISSIONEE] SET [COMMISSION_DATE] = @CommissionDate ,[USER_LOGIN] = @LastEditBy ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE [CONTRACT_ID] = @ContractID END END END END
